articles.title: On CCTV, Man Rescued From Lift In Gurgaon Repeatedly Slaps Liftman, Guard
articles.description: A man has been arrested in Gurgaon after he was seen repeatedly slapping his apartment's security guard and another person right after he was rescued from a lift.

articles.title: Who was Ankita Singh, 19-year-old burnt alive by stalker in Jharkhand
articles.description: Ankita Singh, a 19-year-old, was burnt alive by an alleged stalker in Jharkhand's Dumka on August 23. She died on August 28.
articles.content: Ankita Singh, a Class 12 student from Jharkhand's Dumka, was aiming to become a police officer. Her hopes were dashed on an ill-fated night when she was set ablaze by her alleged stalker, identified … [+2574 chars]

articles.title: Tharoor tests waters, calls for ‘free and fair’ contest for Cong chief’s post with ‘several candidates’
articles.description: Sources said Lok Sabha MP Shashi Tharoor is considering throwing his hat in the ring as he believes that it is time to put forward a fresh set of ideas and an alternate vision for the party, which is facing its worst electoral and organisational crisis ever.

articles.description: The death toll from the devastating floods in Pakistan neared 1,100 Monday, as international aid began to trickle in.
